summary: Changes all horse saddles to a custom black saddle, using the same mesh as Shadowmere\'s.
descriptionHtml:
Changes all horse saddles to a custom black saddle, using the same mesh as Shadowmere\'s. 
I felt the default saddles were pretty ugly, and wanted to fix that.
Every \"normal\" saddle (including Frost\'s) will be changed to the new black version.

If anyone is interested in a custom color, let me know.
Enjoy!
author: MsMatching
